person.persName: Thomas Edwards (Mercer County, Kentucky druggist and judge)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky druggist and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy E. Edwards. Father of William W. Edwards. Presiding judge of the Mercer County Court from 1861 to 1866.
